Headline: I inherited $1.2 million after a tragedy in my family. My low money-market interest rate is ending. What now?
Summary: “Each month, I have been living better because of the interest.”

Headline: Jennifer Lawrence sells gorgeous $11 million Beverly Hills home in off-market deal

Headline: Nike warns turnaround ‘won’t be linear,’ but sees signs of life at retail chains
